name: King's Quest - Chapter 3: Once Upon a Climb
name_original: King's Quest - Chapter 3: Once Upon a Climb
description:
King's Quest - Chapter 3: Once Upon a Climb is an adventure game developed by The Odd Gentlemen. It was originally released in 2016. Sierra Games published the game.
You can play King's Quest - Chapter 3: Once Upon a Climb on PC and PlayStation 3.
